skills.name: State Change
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) When the battle begins, the character will be in the <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C132051]</color> State.\nAfter this character takes $[K103], it will become <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C137012]</color>.\nAfter this character takes $[K104], it will become <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C137013]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) When the battle begins, the character will be in the <color=#FFFFFFFF>Terrain Advantage</color> State.\nAfter this character takes {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>, it will become <color=#FFFFFFFF>Scorched</color>.\nAfter this character takes {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>, it will become <color=#FFFFFFFF>Activated</color>.
skills.description:
(Passive) When the battle begins, the character will be in the Terrain Advantage State.
After this character takes Pyro DMG, it will become Scorched.
After this character takes Electro DMG, it will become Activated.
